nodes.text: Nuclear bombs should not be casually re-engineered for ordinary battlefield use.
If  the U.S. re-engeneer nuclear bombs it causes their threshold for nuclear weapons use to appear to lower
It is plasuble that Pakistan and India lower their thresold as well
If a state lowers the threshold of use the possibilities of the use increase
a chief objective of American policy is to make sure these weapons are never used.
The lowering of the nuclear weapons threshold causes other states to lower it as well
countries like Pakistan India and probably North Korea have added nuclear weapons to their arsenals
Washington must be wary of appearing to lower the psychological threshold for nuclear weapons use
